name: G FINDS WHO ASKED: OFFICIAL ITCH.IO VERSION
name_original: G FINDS WHO ASKED: OFFICIAL ITCH.IO VERSION
description:
G (aka the creator bcuz persona) IS OUT TO FIND WHO ASKED. THERE IS ALSO PEDESTRIANS ON THE ROAD EVEN WHEN THEYRE NOT SUPPOSED TO BE. YOUR GOAL IS TO NOT HIT THE PEDESTRIANS AS IT IS ILLEGAL, AND G DOESN'T WANT TO SPEND EVEN A MILLISECOND IN FEDERAL PRISON AGAIN

USE THE ARROW KEYS/WASD TO AVOID HITTING PEDESTRIANS

FIND WHO ASKED (spoiler alert: no one did)

Huge thanks to @lifg on Scratch for the original game.

https://scratch.mit.edu/users/lifg/
